ruling: - The number of [[Good Goblin Housekeeping]] cards referred to by the effect is counted at resolution of this effect. So, if you have no copies of [[Good Goblin Housekeeping]] in your Graveyard, and you activate [[Good Goblin Housekeeping]] and chain [[Emergency Provisions]] to send it to the Graveyard, you would draw 2 cards.

- You can activate this card when you have no copies of [[Good Goblin Housekeeping]] in your Graveyard.  You will draw 1 card in this case, then return 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your Deck.
